issues.fix: Replace "var" with "const" for constants or "let" for variables

issues.issue: Using loose equality (==) instead of strict equality (===)

issues.fix: Consider using Array methods like forEach(), map(), or filter()
Add try-catch blocks for robust error handling

suggestions: Refactor: Use const/let instead of var for better scoping
Refactor: Use === for type-safe equality checks
Modernize: Replace for-loops with Array methods (map, filter, reduce)
